content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for research support, but no Lab was crafted or placed due to inventory shortages and crafting pipeline issues. Pre‐existing smelting facilities (a furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper) were accessed for resource conversion, but no new production structures were created.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors – When calling get_entities(), unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments led to type errors. Verify and adhere to the API’s expected parameter order and types.
• Entity Retrieval and Iteration – Ensure that the result of functions like get_entities() is properly checked (i.e. not None) before iterating over it, to avoid 'NoneType' object is not iterable errors.
• Placement Failures – Confirm that the target item (e.g. a Lab) is available in inventory prior to attempting its placement, to prevent placement errors.
• Crafting Chain Issues – Before attempting to craft complex items like a Lab, verify that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-plates needed for iron-gear-wheels and copper-plates for copper-cables) can be produced or are available. Establish a robust production chain to satisfy all recipe requirements.
